channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloudflare -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloudflare -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-3348|2024-10-09T20:34:14.644Z -- cloudflare -- wrangler
item.description: The Wrangler command line tool (<=wrangler@3.1.0 or <=wrangler@2.20.1) was affected by a directory traversal vulnerability when running a local development server for Pages (wrangler pages dev command). This vulnerability enabled an attacker in the same network as the victim to connect to the local development server and access the victim's files present outside of the directory for the development server.

item.title: CVE-2023-3766|2024-10-09T20:33:55.971Z -- cloudflare -- odoh-rs
item.description: A vulnerability was discovered in the odoh-rs rust crate that stems from faulty logic during the parsing of encrypted queries. This issue specifically occurs when processing encrypted query data received from remote clients and enables an attacker with knowledge of this vulnerability to craft and send specially designed encrypted queries to targeted ODOH servers running with odoh-rs. Upon successful exploitation, the server will crash abruptly, disrupting its normal operation and rendering the service temporarily unavailable.
